variant.bodyText: In the article Practical Experiments with Regular Approximation of Context-Free Lan- guages by Mark-Jan Nederhof that appeared in Computational Linguistics 26(1), the equation on page 19 that reads
variant.equation: ]i[A E N A B E Ni] - ct1B131 A B a2A02] I should read 3i[A E N, A B E Nd a2, 132 [A ct11301 A B a2i4132], instead.

variant.title: Erratum the article Experiments with Regular Approximation of Context-Free Lan- Mark-Jan Nederhof that appeared in Linguistics the
variant.abstract: equation on page 19 that reads N A A should read N, Nd a2, 132 a2i4132], instead.
